caption: This photograph features a group of five deer grazing in a field. The field is partially covered with patches of dry, barren ground and areas rich in yellow flowers. In the background, there is a dense line of trees composed mainly of dark and light green leaves, providing a dense forested backdrop. The natural lighting suggests it is either early morning or late afternoon, casting soft light across the scene that enhances the rural, tranquil ambiance of the setting. The composition is focused on capturing this serene moment in nature, highlighting the deer in their natural habitat as they engage quietly in grazing.
title: Wild fawn at their feeding place
